alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 29 at 2:17PM MST until January 31 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range, Platte County, South Laramie Range and Foothills including Vedauwoo, Bordeaux, and Wheatland. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
